Iâ€™m at China, ChengDo(æˆéƒ½). I come to China to follow laboratory parters. My teacher is Chinese, So I appreciate him. Date is between 6/23(Thu) to 6/26(Mon).

Day 1, 6/23(Thu)

I ride the plane, this date. I went to Chengdo(æˆéƒ½) via Shanghai(ä¸Šæµ·) from Haneda(ç¾½ç”°).

Ride time is long, and the planeâ€™s evironment is not good. Itâ€™s noisy by plane engine, and population density is high(cuz economy class). So I was tired and sleepy in ride time.

In addition, The plane which went to Chendo from Shanghai is LATE. So I was confused, and I was unlucky.

So, I get up AM 6:00(JP), and my sleeping time in China Hotel is 2:30(CH).

Day 2, 6/23(Thu)

I get up at 9:00. I had a breakfast in hotel. This breakfast type is buffet(ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒƒãƒ•ã‚§). My favorite food is sum of porridge and SPICY vegetable in the breakfast foods.

At next, I had Hot pot(ç«é‹) with my teacher. Hot pot looks Fire. I had fire.

After I get hotel, My body is burnnigğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥.

At night, we were invited to dinner by my teacher. His friend sets GORGEOUS dinner.

His friend says â€œThis restaurant serves the best Sichuan food(å››å·æ–™ç†) in Chengdu restaurantâ€.

So we had foods of best of quality in this trip! AT FIRST DAY!!!

At the honest, I satisfied in this trip, because I was not interested in some landmarksâ€¦
